item.description:
11/11/10
I was told on Oct. 29, that if we go to MTH at 2:00 on 11/21 that we will hear
stories from Tom Lee, Storyteller.

http://tomleestorytel...

tomleestoryteller.com/introduction.htm

I like to hear a good story.

Then after he is done we can get tickets for a MTH Tour.

Sounds like a fun day.

If you do not want to listen to Tom Lee, then show up after 2:30 or so to
See if he is done. When he is done, then you can join us for the MTH Tour.

Is the Mark Twain House really Haunted?
For you ghost investigators in the group, you cannot use cameras
in the MTH, but you can use recording devices & the Small Hand Held
Devices that can gage for energy & can gage for heat loss
(just remember that it is Winter like conditions in an old house).

When I went on the MTH Graveyard Ghost Tour on 10/29, there were
Some kids who had those devices, but I kept an eye on the devices
and they did not "catch" anything. I did sense something in the
"Teaching Room" & "Billards Room" but that time not in the "Nursery Room"
As I did on 10/23.
What I sensed on 10/23 probably went next door into the "Teaching Roon".

I know that I still need to do a Trip Report for 10/29.
Mike B

9/26/10
Regarding the question of where do we meet?
I sent those who RSVP Yes or Maybe a separate memo
Before the Meet Up. I will still do that for this MU.
There are benches by the wall between the Information
Room Enterance & where the tickets are sold.
I will either be on or near those benches before the
Meet Up (unless I get stuck in traffic or something).
I will have my Purple Backpack with me.
I hope that more members RSVP Yes.

I will send another reminder closer to the time of this Meet Up.

Mike B.


8/15/10
Mark Twain is still such a contemporary public figure
That he was on the cover of Newsweek, August 9, 2010 issue.
I have not had a chance to read the articles yet.

Who wants to take a tour of the Mark Twain House & Museum?

http://www.marktwainh...

www.marktwainhouse.org/


We can talk about car pooling if you are interested in going.
item.how_to_find_us: I will contact those who RSVP Yes and Maybe.

group.name: Greater New Haven Unknown Zone Meetup Group

item.name: Unknown Zone Searchs the Mark Twain's House
